hero.name: Khaled Alabsi
hero.description: I architect and deliver enterprise-grade modernization solutions that transform manual, legacy-dependent operations into intelligent, automated systems. With deep expertise in full-stack development and AI integration, I accelerate digital transformation initiatives while maintaining system stability and scalability. I convert ambitious technical visions into deployed, production-ready platforms.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Digital Transformation Expert, Software Engineer & Continuous Researcher
about.description: I help organizations digitize critical operations, modernize legacy systems, and deliver resilient enterprise applications. Years of field experience combined with ongoing research allow me to translate complex requirements into pragmatic, future-ready solutions.
highlights: What I Deliver: Modernized mission-critical systems for banking, insurance, and manufacturing clients, transforming legacy architectures into scalable, cloud-native platforms. Designed automation programs that eliminate manual processing bottlenecks, reduce operational risk, and accelerate time-to-market. Delivered enterprise solutions that handle high-volume transactions while maintaining system stability and compliance requirements.

Experience: 10+ years leading enterprise software projects across the full development lifecycle—from requirements analysis and architecture design through deployment and optimization. Deep expertise in full-stack development, microservices architecture, DevOps practices, cloud migration strategies, and legacy system transformation. Proven track record of delivering complex projects on time while managing technical debt and ensuring maintainability.

Approach: I bridge cutting-edge research with pragmatic enterprise delivery, applying emerging technologies like agentic AI, workflow orchestration, and intelligent automation to solve real-world business challenges. Active researcher exploring human-in-the-loop systems and advanced software engineering practices. Trusted advisor for C-level stakeholders, solution architects, and delivery teams—translating business strategy into technical roadmaps and executable solutions.
Availability: Available worldwide for modernization projects, cloud migration engagements, and technical consulting assignments.

skills.name: Agentic AI Solutions
technologies: Agentic Systems for Legacy Code Migration

experience.title: Digital Solutions & Project Portfolio
experience.subtitle: Transforming Manual Processes & Modernizing Legacy Systems

projects.title: Enterprise Digital Transformation
projects.description: Converted paper-heavy operations into unified digital workflows with automated document processing, governed approvals, and real-time performance dashboards—cutting turnaround time while eliminating manual rework.

projects.title: Legacy System Modernization & Migration
projects.description: Replatformed COBOL and mainframe applications into modular Java microservices, preserving core business logic while improving reliability, maintainability, and scale for regulated banking and insurance programs.

projects.title: Manufacturing Process Digitization
projects.description: Digitized quality control and inventory processes with IoT telemetry, live monitoring, and predictive maintenance workflows to raise operational visibility and production throughput.

projects.title: Banking Digital Workflow Automation
projects.description: Delivered a secure, scalable securities platform with automated approval workflows that replaced manual reviews, strengthened compliance evidence, and accelerated processing for frontline teams.

projects.title: Insurance Claims Processing Modernization
projects.description: Modernized claims processing by automating data intake and approvals, introducing ML-supported fraud detection, and orchestrating claims routing by complexity and risk profile.

projects.title: Enterprise Cloud Migration & DevOps
projects.description: Directed enterprise cloud migrations from on-premise estates to resilient cloud infrastructure, implementing container platforms, infrastructure-as-code, and CI/CD pipelines for secure, repeatable delivery.

projects.title: Securities Products Platform (Banking)
projects.description: Built a modular micro-frontend platform for banking securities products using Spring Boot and React, improving maintainability, deployment cadence, and integration with existing CI/CD tooling.

projects.title: Industrial Process Monitoring System
projects.description: Delivered an AI-enabled monitoring suite with multivariate control charts and statistical anomaly detection, improving early detection of process deviations while reducing false alarms for plant operators.

inspiration.title: Turn Your Ideas Into Reality
inspiration.subtitle: Digital transformation starts with a single step
inspiration.description: Digital transformation starts with spotting friction in everyday work. These scenarios highlight how thoughtful technology can remove bottlenecks and amplify your team's expertise.
